uvi.product_version: versions from v3.16 to before v4.9.277
uvi.description:
usb: max-3421: Prevent corruption of freed memory

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v4.9.277 by commit ae3209b9fb086661ec1de4d8f4f0b951b272bbcd, it was introduced in version v3.16 by commit 2d53139f31626bad6f8983d8e519ddde2cbba921. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: usb: max-3421: Prevent corruption of freed memory
